meanings.sent1: There were gazillions of stars in the night sky.
meanings.sent2: She had gazillions of toys in her room.
meanings.sent3: The bakery made gazillions of cookies for the event.
meanings.sent4: The teacher had to grade gazillions of papers over the weekend.
meanings.sent5: The treasure chest was filled with gazillions of gold coins.

meanings.definition: An extremely large amount or quantity
meanings.sent1: He made gazillions of dollars from his successful business.
meanings.sent2: There were gazillions of people at the concert.
meanings.sent3: The cat knocked over the vase, causing gazillions of pieces to scatter.
meanings.sent4: The storm brought gazillions of raindrops downpouring from the sky.
meanings.sent5: The factory produced gazillions of shoes every year.
